node.title: 'Wife' of alleged BDSM sex cult leader charged with child grooming offences
node.alt: A bald man wearing a black T-shirt
node.description: Hunter Davis, who was involved in an alleged BDSM sex cult, is facing 12 charges including using a carriage service to prepare to engage in sexual activity with a minor, and transmitting child abuse material.
node.content: ["A 22-year-old woman who was involved in an alleged BDSM sex cult has been charged over sexual activity with minors and morphine possession.", "Hunter Davis was arrested yesterday in Blacktown, in Sydney's west,\u00a0and charged with six counts of using a carriage service to prepare or plan to engage in sexual activity with a minor and five counts of transmitting child abuse material.", "It's understood the charges relate to at least two victims and carry a combined maximum prison time of more than 25 years.", "The arrest comes as part of an ongoing AFP human trafficking investigation code named Operation Saintes which began earlier this year after a Four Corners investigation into the group.", "The woman's partner, 40-year-old James Davis, was arrested during a dramatic AFP raid on a rural property near Armidale in March where he was living with several women he called his \"slaves\".", "Mr Davis was a prolific user of social media before his arrest, calling himself a \"patriarchal overlord\" and publicly boasting of his \"alternative lifestyle\".", "The women in the group shared on social media that they had signed slave contracts, wore collars and claimed they were living in a consensual BDSM master/slave relationship with Mr\u00a0Davis.", "Social media posts obtained by the ABC\u00a0reveal several women, including Hunter Davis \u2014 who is\u00a0also known as Grace Boyce-Carnus \u2014\u00a0joined the group while they were still teenagers and in high school.", "The AFP raided the rural property where James Davis lived with his partners in March after the ABC provided information to police.", "Mr Davis is now facing 58 federal and state charges spanning 20 years including rape, assault, animal torture, child pornography and kidnapping offences, along with several counts of using a carriage service to prepare or plan to engage in sexual activity with a person under 16.", "The AFP spent more than two days scouring Davis' property at Yarrowyk for evidence and confiscated illegal weapons, ammunition, filming equipment and hard drives which were being forensically analysed.\u00a0", "Police now say during the raid they also discovered an IV bag containing 30 grams of morphine which they allege was stolen from a hospital.", "Hunter Davis is due to appear before Blacktown Court today on 12 charges including possessing the schedule 8 drug.", "The ABC can reveal she\u00a0was registered to work as a nurse but had restrictions placed on her registration earlier this year.\u00a0", "The conditions included that she must not supply, check or administer any drug of addiction, or work without supervision.", "AFP Detective Superintendent Craig Bellis said police were continuing to investigate and asked anyone with information to come forward.", "\"AFP investigators have worked tirelessly to investigate this matter, and further analysis of material seized in March 2021 search warrants has resulted in these charges against a second person.", "\"The AFP will not rule out further charges in this matter.\""]
